QuestData.Title: Necessary Ingredients
QuestData.Description:
As you are well aware, a ritual of this complexity requires several reagents. I have asked that Carver Jor'dan prepare what I'll need.
Seek him out in the Reagentry, and provide whatever assistance he requests.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Jor'dan the Powerful in the Reagentry.
QuestData.RewardText: You are Kel'Thuzad's acolyte, are you not?
